Module takMashido.shani
Package takMashido.shani.core.text

Class ShaniString

java.lang.Object
takMashido.shani.core.text.ShaniString
All Implemented Interfaces:
IntendBase
public class ShaniString
extends java.lang.Object
implements IntendBase
Object used to represent string values in SHANI. It is optimized for fuzzy string matching and have some methods allowing it. Also can contain one or more String for printing or used as keywords to search in other ShaniString objects.
Author:
TakMashido

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    static class  ShaniString.ArraysMatchingResoult  
    class  ShaniString.ShaniMatcher
    An engine that performs match operations on a ShaniString.

      Creates new ShaniString.

      Parameters:
      origin - Strings containing data. All of them will be cutted on '*' occurrences.

    • ShaniString

      public ShaniString​(org.w3c.dom.Node origin)
      Load ShaniString from xml node. Any change done to this object will also be pushed to given node.
      Parameters:
      origin - XML Node storing ShaniString data.

    • ShaniString

      public ShaniString​(org.w3c.dom.Node originNode, java.lang.String origin)
      Load ShaniString from xml node. Any change done to this object will also be pushed to given node. Also put origin data to created ShaniString and add it to Node.
      Parameters:
      originNode - XML Node storing ShaniString data.
      origin - New data to push into created ShaniString.

    • split

      public ShaniString[][] split()
      Splits ShaniString to words group and each to single words.
      Returns:
      Array[][] of words. Each entry is single word.

    • split

      public ShaniString[][] split​(boolean cut)
      Splits ShaniString to words group and each to single words.
      Parameters:
      cut - If cut given ShaniString on each occurrence of '*'
      Returns:
      Array[][] of words. Each entry is single word.

      Load ShaniString from xml node. Equivalent to Storage.getShaniString(Node, String).
      Parameters:
      doc - Document to inside which search is performed.
      path - Path to ShaniString inside node.

      Parameters:
      where - Base node for search.
      path - Path to ShaniString inside node.

      Returns:
      If given String is equal to this ShaniString.

    • equals

      public boolean equals​(ShaniString str)
      Check if this is equal to this. It don't check if two ShaniString are same, but perform fuzzy String Matching.
      Parameters:
      str - ShaniString to Check.
      Returns:
      If given shaniString is equal to this.

    • getMatchingIndex

      public static ShaniString.ArraysMatchingResoult getMatchingIndex​(ShaniString[] data, int dataIndex, ShaniString[] str)
      Tries to find optimal match between two ShaniString arrays using dtw algorithm.
      Parameters:
      data - Array of ShaniString where search will be performed.
      dataIndex - Index on which matching will start. Data before it are skipped.
      str - Acts like regex Pattern. Contain keywords which will be applied on data arg.
      Returns:
      ShaniString.ArraysMatchingResoult object containing cost of optimal match and index of last matched word in data array.

    • getMatchingIndexMovable

      public static ShaniString.ArraysMatchingResoult getMatchingIndexMovable​(ShaniString[] data, int dataIndex, ShaniString[] str)
      Tries to find optimal match between two ShaniString arrays using dtw algorithm. Starting point of match can be on any point greater then dataIndex. That is only difference between this and getMatchingIndex method.
      Parameters:
      data - Array of ShaniString where search will be performed.
      dataIndex - Index on which matching will start. Data before it are skipped.
      str - Acts like regex Pattern. Contain keywords which will be applied on data arg.
      Returns:
      ShaniString.ArraysMatchingResoult object containing cost of optimal match, index of first and last matched word in data array.

    • isEquals

      public boolean isEquals​(java.util.regex.Pattern pattern)
      Check if one of underlying strings matches given regex Pattern.
      Parameters:
      pattern - Patter used to check equality.
      Returns:
      If one of underlying strings matches given regex Pattern.

    • charCompare

      protected static short charCompare​(char[] a, char[] b)
      Compare to char arrays using Damerauďż˝Levenshtein algorithm.
      Parameters:
      a - model
      b - compared number
      Returns:
      DTW distance between two char[]

      Prints content to System.out. Equivalent to System.out.println(toString()).

    • toFullString

      public java.lang.String toFullString()
      Returns full String representation. Contain each underlying String splitted with '*' character. new ShaniString(oldShaniString.toFullString()) should give object identical to oldShaniString.
      Returns:
      String representing this ShaniString.
